name: Bright Flash
effects: Physical light damage (2x, ATK) to all enemies
Increase resistance to Confusion by 100% for all allies for 3 turns

desc_short: Light damage all enemies and boost confusion resistance for all allies
對全體敵人發動光屬性攻擊+提高全體隊員混亂耐性

desc_long: Deals light damage to all enemies, and boosts resistance to confusion for all allies.
對全體敵人發動光屬性攻擊並提高全體隊員混亂耐性的數值。
적 전체에 빛속성 피해를 주고, 아군 전체의 혼란 저항력이 상승합니다.
Dégâts de lumière sur tous les ennemis et augmente la rés. à la confusion pour tous les alliés
